Title: Gremlins
Overview: When Billy Peltzer is given a strange but adorable pet named Gizmo for Christmas, he inadvertently breaks the three important rules of caring for a Mogwai, unleashing a horde of mischievous gremlins on a small town.
Tagline: Don't get him wet, keep him out of bright light, and never NEVER feed him after midnight.
Keywords: holiday, monster, small town, department store, bars and restaurants, human animal relationship, pet, sunlight, chain saw, salesperson, midnight, fur, banking, puppet, skunk, kids and family, gremlin, ymca
Cast: Zach Galligan, Phoebe Cates, Hoyt Axton
